solution_line_template: If Dave won {dave_more_than_jerry} more games than Jerry, and Jerry won {jerry_games} games, then Dave won {dave_games} games.

If Ken won {ken_more_than_dave} more games than Dave, and Dave won {dave_games} games, then Ken won {dave_games}+{ken_more_than_dave}=<<{dave_games}+{ken_more_than_dave}={ken_games}>>{ken_games} games.
In total, the three friends played {jerry_games}+{dave_games}+{ken_games}=<<{jerry_games}+{dave_games}+{ken_games}={total_games}>>{total_games} games.
